sentences.en: a powerful car with a 170 horsepower engine
sentences.cn: 发动机为170马力的大功率汽车

sentences.en: Ely raced his 50 horsepower engine and started to roll down the ramp.
sentences.cn: 伊利起动了他的五十马力引擎,开始从跑道上下滑.

sentences.en: Harvesting grain in the 19 th century required plenty of horsepower and manpower.
sentences.cn: 十九世纪时,收割谷物需要大量的畜力和人力.

sentences.en: Horsepower is just a stupid way of saying Newtons.
sentences.cn: 马力只是一种白痴的表达牛顿的方法.

sentences.en: If 100 - octane race fuel is used, output rises to some 400 horsepower.
sentences.cn: 如果100辛烷燃料用尽的比赛, 产量上升到400马力.

sentences.en: Janet : Basiclly, one has more horsepower than the other.
sentences.cn: 主要是那辆比另一辆马力大.

sentences.en: Power plant is a four - cylinder, 75 horsepower air - cooled engine.
sentences.cn: 动力装置是一台四气缸 、 75马力的气冷式发动机.

sentences.en: Strong tension line, the burden of high - horsepower loads will not show.
sentences.cn: 强力张力线, 负担高马力负载面不会展.

sentences.en: The biggest advantage of having a supercharger is the increased horsepower.
sentences.cn: 机械增压机最大的有点是增加你汽车的动力.

sentences.en: The engine has more than 4,000 horsepower.
The engine of this car was altered to have more horsepower.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车引擎被改装过,让马力更增加.

sentences.en: The engine puts out thirty horsepower.
sentences.cn: 这台发动机可产生30马力.

sentences.en: the superior horsepower of a Volkswagen
The worshiper thinks that the worst is the insufficient horsepower.
sentences.cn: 崇拜者认为最坏的事是马力不足.

sentences.en: This engine puts out more than one thousand horsepower.
sentences.cn: 这台发动机可产生一千匹以上的马力.

sentences.en: You have taken my horsepower, but I will get it back.
sentences.cn: 你夺去了我的马力, 但是我还会夺回来的.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring the power of an engine, or the power of an engine measured like this
